\eject \pdfpagewidth=250mm \pdfpageheight=400mm

```{r}
library(MeltR)
library(tidyverse)
devtools::load_all()

df = df.absorbance %>% filter(Experiment == "CROWD DP5")

meltR.A.fit = meltR.A(df,
        NucAcid = c("RNA", "ACCGGU"),
        Mmodel = "Homoduplex.2State",
        concT = 80,
        fitTs = c(20, 65))

Trimmed = BLTrimmer(meltR.A.fit,
                    n.ranges.float = 5,
                    range.step.float = 5,
                    n.combinations = 1000)


Combination = c()
SD.dH1 = c()
dH1.minus.dH2 = c()


for (i in 1:8){
  Combination = 
  SD.dH1 = Trimmed$List.fits[[1]]$Summary[1,3]/Trimmed$List.fits[[1]]$Summary[1,3]
  dH1.minus.dH2 = abs(Trimmed$List.fits[[1]]$Summary[1,3] Trimmed$List.fits[[1]]$Summary[2,3])
}

Trimmed$List.fits[[1]]$Summary


```
